ygData.subject: RE: [RE: [RE: [eqbards] How do you play this game?]]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes. Thus the reason I don t use number pad for hotkeys I use the numbers across the top of the keyboard. Of course, I have a Natural keyboard -- I wonder
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 20 Apr 2000, Webber, Jessica wrote:

>Heh, just tried hitting my number keys like they were hotkeys. Shift-6 is a
>bit of a stretch for my little hands.

Yes. Thus the reason I don't use number pad for hotkeys

I use the numbers across the top of the keyboard.
Of course, I have a Natural keyboard -- I wonder if the distance
on that is less?

>So how does mouselook work?

You turn with how the mouse moves. And you're always going forward
whichever way you're facing.

(To back up, I have to use keyboard. but I don't
do that often)
===================================================
Sarah sarah@...

My picture of the world is of masses of people extending gifts to other
people, doing favors -- but nobody keeping score. -- Dr. Whitsett
